name: Trade
description: Accepts the trade based on which screen is currently open

methods.name: Item
methods.description: Gets the items in the other player's trade screen

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Returns an array of items from the trade screen

methods.name: getMyItems
methods.description: Gets the items in your trade screen

methods.name: getTheirItems
methods.description: Gets the items in the other player's trade screen

methods.name: isOpen
methods.description: Checks if trade is open at all

methods.name: getFirstTitle
methods.description: Gets the Title of the first trade screen - contains Trading With name

methods.name: getTradingWith
methods.description: Gets the name of the player you're trading with.

methods.name: canAccept
methods.description: Checks if the Accept button is available to click

methods.name: acceptTrade
methods.description: Accepts the trade based on which screen is currently open

methods.name: hasAcceptedTrade
methods.signature: public static boolean hasAcceptedTrade​(@NonNull TradeUser tradeUser)
methods.description: Checks if the user specified has accepted the trade

methods.name: declineTrade
methods.description: Declines the trade based on which screen is currently open

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes screen based on which screen is currently open

methods.name: verifyTrade
methods.signature: public static boolean verifyTrade​(boolean myScreen, @NonNull Item[] expected)
methods.description: Simply checks the given array of Items against the array of items in the screen - must be on the second trade screen

methods.name: contains
methods.signature: public static boolean contains​(boolean myScreen, int amount, @NonNull java.lang.String itemName)
methods.description: Checks if your or their trade screen contains at least specified amount of specified item name.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the trade offer

methods.name: getItem
methods.signature: public static @Nullable Item getItem​(boolean myScreen, @NonNull java.lang.String itemName)
methods.description: Returns item specified from the screen with name specified.

methods.name: tradeWithPlayer
methods.signature: public static boolean tradeWithPlayer​(@NonNull java.lang.String playerName)
methods.description: Trades with player specified

methods.name: addItem
methods.signature: public static boolean addItem​(@NonNull java.lang.String itemName, int amount)
methods.description: Adds an item from your inventory to trade screen. If the amount is greater than or equal to your current inventory amount, it puts all in.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.signature: public static boolean removeItem​(@NonNull java.lang.String itemName, int amount)
methods.description: Removes an item from the trade screen. If the amount is greater than or equal to the current amount in trade, it removes ALL

methods.name: slotBounds
methods.description: Performs the slotBounds operation.
